6.3.3 The Simulation Setups

Following in the Edit menu is a list of simulation setups. Whenever you define a new simulation setup it appears in this list. The currently selected simulation setup is marked. You can run or restart a simulation by selecting it from this menu.


Eckhart Arnold 2006-10-14
